original_text: And they set out from before Hahiroth and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness, and they went a three days' journey in the wilderness of Etham and camped at Marah.
korean_text: 하히롯 앞을 떠나 광야를 바라보고 바다 가운데를 지나 에담 광야로 사흘 길을 가서 마라에 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: And they set out from before Hahiroth
and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness
and they went a three days' journey in the wilderness of Etham
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 에담 광야에서 사흘 길을 행진하여
